ygData.subject: RE: Level 12 Song Bellow
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Bellow is a DD damage song, I m not sure, but I think it does 8dmg now?  Basically you can use it like an extra attack (think of it as an extra sword).
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Tieben, David P" <TiebeDP@...>
>
> Hail all,
>
> I have a newbie question to ask. I have recently gained Level 12 and have
> been experimeting with bellow. I had a few questions such as: is it a DD
> or
> AE song and if I bellow one creature can it effect others such that they
> will follow along and attack me. I wanted to know a little about the
> possible strategies that people use with this song. Thanks for all your
> help.
>
> Rylos of E' ci
> Lvl 12 bard
>
Bellow is a DD damage song, I'm not sure, but I think it does 8dmg
now? Basically you can use it like an extra attack (think of it as an extra
sword). Another benefit is that it will sometimes interrupt a caster. If
attacking a mob (with any means) would cause others to come after you, then
so will Bellow. In other words, if there's a single scarab you want to
attack, go ahead, but if there are 3 dervishes, bellow would bring all 3,
just like using ranged weapons would do.

Bien - Karana
